summary: Ran through almost all the active NPCs (ie not quest, not random bandits) and replaced any with warpaint with a race/gender appropriate neutral texture (stolen from another NPC with a little less ZAZZ).  Replaces textures specific to NPCs, list inside.  Also does some makeup(optional).
descriptionHtml:
REPLACES NPC-SPECIFIC FACE TINTMASK TEXTURES WITH GENDER/RACE-SPECIFIC NEUTRAL TEXTURE.

Compatible with all the Better Females type mods since its not overriding general textures, these are specific to each NPC. 

Note that \"neutral\" does not mean blank.  I picked a texture from that gender/race that was fairly neutral but not completely blank.  Khajiit and Argonians were not touched as they are in a different category (warpaint actually probably looks fine on them).

There are 3 options in the main file designated by Data(option).
All: both
Warpaint: just warpaint
Makeup: just makeup

As far as selection of NPCs:
For warpaint, it\'s obvious the criteria.
For makeup, I generally went for any extremely heavy or off-color makeup (like bright green on a redguard).  It\'s not consistent and that\'s why it\'s optional, although halfway through I realized that awful starburst over the eye was warpaint and not makeup, so some of them are in makeup.  At worst, you will get a plain jane/jack NPC.

Gigantic list (also in list.txt in the zip) below.  If you want to revert a specific NPC in this list, find their FormID (000xxxx) and delete that .dds in the \\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facetint\\skyrim.esm folder
